amendment.description: To modify the authorized methods for the acquisition of land to be added to the Shiloh National Military Park.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2349 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2349 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S3263; text: CR S3263) To modify the authorized methods for the acquisition of land to be added to the Shiloh National Military Park.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2349 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murkowski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2349 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
